SELECT CASE
WHEN clpm.id IS NULL THEN clpm2.id ELSE clpm.id END AS id FROM mst_stu sm INNER JOIN mst_usr um ON um.usr_id = sm.stu_id AND um.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN mst_crmsch_learn_prd clpm ON sm.schy_div = clpm.schy_div AND clpm.use_flg = '1' AND clpm.del_flg = 0 AND clpm.org_id = um.org_id LEFT JOIN mst_crmsch_learn_prd clpm2 ON clpm2.schy_div = sm.schy_div AND clpm2.use_flg = '1' AND clpm2.del_flg = 0 AND clpm2.org_id = ( SELECT upplev_org_id FROM mst_org om INNER JOIN mst_usr a ON a.org_id = om.org_id AND a.del_flg = 0 INNER JOIN mst_stu B ON b.stu_id = a.usr_id AND B.stu_id = #{stuId} AND b.del_flg = 0 ) AND clpm2.del_flg = 0 WHERE sm.stu_id = #{stuId} AND sm.del_flg = 0

SELECT DISTINCT SM.stu_id, SM.flnm_nm, SM.flnm_lnm, SM.phot_path, UM1.org_id, OM1.org_nm, COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) AS unNoticeReadCount, COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unEventReadCount, COALESCE ( gurm.unreadMessageCount, 0 ) AS unMessageReadCount, COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) + COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unreadCount FROM mst_stu SM INNER JOIN mst_usr UM1 ON UM1.usr_id=SM.stu_id AND UM1.del_flg=0 INNER JOIN mst_usr UM2 ON (UM2.usr_id = SM.guard_id OR UM2.usr_id = SM.guard1_id OR UM2.usr_id = SM.guard2_id OR UM2.usr_id = SM.guard3_id OR UM2.usr_id = SM.guard4_id) AND UM2.usr_id = #{guard} AND UM2.del_flg = 0 INNER JOIN mst_org OM1 ON OM1.org_id=UM1.org_id AND OM1.del_flg=0 INNER JOIN mst_org OM2 ON OM2.org_id=UM2.org_id AND OM2.del_flg=0 AND OM1.brand_cd=OM2.brand_cd LEFT JOIN ( SELECT grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id, count(grs.id) AS unreadNoticeCount FROM mst_notice MN INNER JOIN guard_reading_sts GRS ON MN.id = GRS.notice_id AND GRS.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN mst_notice_deliver MND ON MN.id = MND.notice_id AND MND.del_flg = 0 AND MND.guard_id = GRS.guard_id AND grs.stu_id = mnd.stu_id WHERE ((MN.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND MN.pub_plan_end_dt >= now( ) AND MN.notice_type_div NOT IN ( '1', '6', '3', '7' )) OR (MN.notice_type_div IN ( '3', '7' ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt >= now( ) - INTERVAL '7 day' )) AND GRS.guard_id = #{guard} AND GRS.reading_sts_div = '0' GROUP BY grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id ) gurn ON gurn.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gurn.stu_id = um1.usr_id AND gurn.org_id = om2.org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id, count(geas.id) AS unreadEventCount FROM guard_event_apply_sts GEAS INNER JOIN mst_event ME ON ME.id = GEAS.event_id AND ME.event_sts_div = '0' AND now() >= ME.pub_start_dt AND ME.pub_end_dt > now() AND ME.del_flg=0 WHERE geas.del_flg = 0 AND geas.reading_sts_div = '0' AND geas.guard_id = #{guard} GROUP BY geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id ) gure on gure.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gure.stu_id = um1.usr_id AND gure.org_id = om2.org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT trs.deliver_id, trs.org_id, count(trs.id) AS unreadMessageCount FROM mst_message mm INNER JOIN talk_reading_sts trs ON mm.id = trs.message_id AND trs.reading_sts_div = '0' AND trs.del_flg=0 AND trs.deliver_id = #{guard} WHERE mm.del_flg = 0 AND (( now() >= mm.pub_plan_start_dt AND mm.pub_plan_end_dt > now()) OR (mm.pub_plan_start_dt IS NULL AND mm.pub_plan_end_dt IS NULL)) AND mm.message_type_div IN ('3','5') GROUP BY trs.deliver_id, trs.org_id ) gurm ON gurm.deliver_id = um2.usr_id AND gurm.org_id = om2.org_id WHERE ( SM.guard_id = #{guard} OR SM.guard1_id = #{guard} OR SM.guard2_id = #{guard} OR SM.guard3_id = #{guard} OR SM.guard4_id = #{guard} ) AND SM.del_flg=0 ORDER BY SM.flnm_nm ,SM.flnm_lnm

SELECT DISTINCT SM.stu_id , SM.flnm_nm , SM.flnm_lnm , SM.phot_path , UM1.org_id , OM1.org_nm , COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) AS unNoticeReadCount , COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unEventReadCount , COALESCE ( gurm.unreadMessageCount, 0 ) AS unMessageReadCount , COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) + COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unreadCount FROM mst_stu SM INNER JOIN mst_usr UM1 ON UM1.usr_id=SM.stu_id AND UM1.del_flg=0 INNER JOIN mst_usr UM2 ON UM2.usr_id = SM.guard_id AND UM2.del_flg = 0 INNER JOIN mst_org OM1 ON OM1.org_id=UM1.org_id AND OM1.del_flg=0 INNER JOIN mst_org OM2 ON OM2.org_id=UM2.org_id AND OM2.del_flg=0 AND OM1.brand_cd=OM2.brand_cd inner join regexp_split_to_table(#{guards}, ',') t1 on t1 = SM.guard_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id, count(grs.id) AS unreadNoticeCount FROM mst_notice MN INNER JOIN guard_reading_sts GRS ON MN.id = GRS.notice_id AND GRS.reading_sts_div = '0' AND GRS.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN mst_notice_deliver MND ON MN.id = MND.notice_id AND MND.del_flg = 0 AND MND.guard_id = GRS.guard_id AND grs.stu_id = mnd.stu_id inner join regexp_split_to_table(#{guards}, ',') t1 on t1 = GRS.guard_id WHERE ((MN.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND MN.pub_plan_end_dt >= now( ) AND MN.notice_type_div NOT IN ( '1', '6', '3', '7' )) OR (MN.notice_type_div IN ( '3', '7' ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt >= now( ) - INTERVAL '7 day' )) GROUP BY grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id ) gurn ON gurn.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gurn.stu_id = um1.usr_id AND gurn.org_id = om2.org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id, count(geas.id) AS unreadEventCount FROM guard_event_apply_sts GEAS INNER JOIN mst_event ME ON ME.id = GEAS.event_id AND ME.event_sts_div = '0' AND now() >= ME.pub_start_dt AND ME.pub_end_dt > now() AND ME.del_flg=0 inner join regexp_split_to_table(#{guards}, ',') t1 on t1 = GEAS.guard_id WHERE geas.del_flg = 0 AND geas.reading_sts_div = '0' GROUP BY geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id ) gure on gure.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gure.stu_id = um1.usr_id AND gure.org_id = om2.org_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT trs.deliver_id, trs.org_id, count(trs.id) AS unreadMessageCount FROM mst_message mm INNER JOIN talk_reading_sts trs ON mm.id = trs.message_id AND trs.reading_sts_div = '0' AND trs.del_flg=0 inner join regexp_split_to_table(#{guards}, ',') t1 on t1 = trs.deliver_id WHERE mm.del_flg = 0 AND (( now() >= mm.pub_plan_start_dt AND mm.pub_plan_end_dt > now()) OR (mm.pub_plan_start_dt IS NULL AND mm.pub_plan_end_dt IS NULL)) AND mm.message_type_div IN ('3','5') GROUP BY trs.deliver_id, trs.org_id ) gurm ON gurm.deliver_id = um2.usr_id AND gurm.org_id = om2.org_id WHERE SM.del_flg=0 ORDER BY SM.flnm_nm ,SM.flnm_lnm

SELECT mu.after_usr_id, mu.usr_id as guardId FROM mst_stu AS ms LEFT JOIN mst_guard AS mg ON ( ms.guard_id = mg.guard_id OR ms.guard1_id = mg.guard_id OR ms.guard2_id = mg.guard_id OR ms.guard3_id = mg.guard_id OR ms.guard4_id = mg.guard_id ) AND mg.del_flg = 0 INNER JOIN mst_usr AS mu ON mu.usr_id = mg.guard_id AND mu.del_flg = 0 WHERE ms.stu_id = #{stuId} AND ms.del_flg = 0

SELECT DISTINCT SM.stu_id, COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) AS unNoticeReadCount, COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unEventReadCount, COALESCE ( gurn.unreadNoticeCount, 0 ) + COALESCE ( gure.unreadEventCount, 0 ) AS unreadCount FROM mst_stu SM INNER JOIN mst_usr UM1 ON SM.guard_id = #{guards} AND UM1.usr_id=SM.stu_id AND UM1.del_flg=0 INNER JOIN mst_usr UM2 ON UM2.usr_id = SM.guard_id AND UM2.del_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id, count(grs.id) AS unreadNoticeCount FROM mst_notice MN INNER JOIN guard_reading_sts GRS ON GRS.guard_id = #{guards} AND MN.id = GRS.notice_id AND GRS.reading_sts_div = '0' AND GRS.del_flg = 0 WHERE ((MN.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND MN.pub_plan_end_dt >= now( ) AND MN.notice_type_div NOT IN ( '1', '6', '3', '7' )) OR (MN.notice_type_div IN ( '3', '7' ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt <= now( ) AND mn.pub_plan_start_dt >= now( ) - INTERVAL '7 day' )) GROUP BY grs.guard_id, grs.stu_id, grs.org_id ) gurn ON gurn.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gurn.stu_id = um1.usr_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id, count(geas.id) AS unreadEventCount FROM guard_event_apply_sts GEAS INNER JOIN mst_event ME ON GEAS.guard_id = #{guards} AND ME.id = GEAS.event_id AND ME.event_sts_div = '0' AND now() >= ME.pub_start_dt AND ME.pub_end_dt > now() AND ME.del_flg=0 WHERE geas.del_flg = 0 AND geas.reading_sts_div = '0' GROUP BY geas.guard_id, geas.stu_id, geas.org_id ) gure ON gure.guard_id = um2.usr_id AND gure.stu_id = um1.usr_id WHERE SM.del_flg=0 AND (gurn.unreadNoticeCount > 0 OR gure.unreadEventCount > 0) ORDER BY SM.stu_id
SELECT mo.brand_cd FROM mst_org mo INNER JOIN mst_usr mu ON mu.org_id = mo.org_id AND mo.del_flg = 0 WHERE mu.del_flg = 0 AND mu.usr_id = #{stuId}
